title.rendered: TTE gets appreciated for being Danfoss’ decarbonization partner

content.rendered: TTE Products & Solutions was part of the Danfoss MENA Climate Solutions Partner Summit, held last week at Rovinj. Over two action-packed days, Dilip Sharma, EVP and Roshan Samuel, VP- TTE Products & Solutions, engaged with the Danfoss team, exploring the latest industry advancements, digital trends, and discussing pressing topics such as compliance and counterfeit products. The summit’s theme, “Shaping Tomorrow’s Legacy,” underscored Danfoss’s commitment to building a sustainable future, evident in the insightful discussions. The team was honored with a certificate of appreciation from Mert Kalafatoglu, Sr. Sales Director TMA, and Marcio Barwinski, Sales Director, for its role as the decarbonization partner for Danfoss in Dubai and the Northern Emirates, contributing to the UAE’s 2050 energy goals.
